LangChain 0.0.292

  • langchain.cache.MomentoCache

langchain.cache.MomentoCacheÂ¶

class langchain.cache.MomentoCache(cache_client: momento.CacheClient, cache_name: str, *, ttl: Optional[timedelta] = None, ensure_cache_exists: bool = True)[source]Â¶

Cache that uses Momento as a backend. See https://gomomento.com/

Instantiate a prompt cache using Momento as a backend.

Note: to instantiate the cache client passed to MomentoCache, you must have a Momento account. See https://gomomento.com/.

Parameters

  • cache_client (CacheClient) â€“ The Momento cache client.

  • cache_name (str) â€“ The name of the cache to use to store the data.

  • ttl (Optional[timedelta], optional) â€“ The time to live for the cache items. Defaults to None, ie use the client default TTL.

  • ensure_cache_exists (bool, optional) â€“ Create the cache if it doesnâ€™t exist. Defaults to True.

Raises

  • ImportError â€“ Momento python package is not installed.

  • TypeError â€“ cache_client is not of type momento.CacheClientObject

  • ValueError â€“ ttl is non-null and non-negative
